messages.content: hey beautiful üòçüòçüòç saw ur pic and WOW. btw i'm actually 28 not 32 like my profile says lol. my mom made the profile and got confused about my age üòÇ so when can we meet?? i know a nice place

Hi Rajesh. Thank you for the message. I must confess, I'm not actually a doctor yet - I'm still in my final year of MBBS. Also, I should mention that I collect vintage dolls and I have 247 of them in my room. Do you like dolls? They're very good listeners and never judge you.

dolls are... interesting? anyway i have to tell u something. i dont actually work at tech mahindra anymore. got fired last month for... creative differences with management üòÖ but dont worry im starting my own crypto company! already have 12 followers on instagram for it. also are u single? like REALLY single? no male friends?

I have many male friends actually. In fact, my best friend Arjun lives with me as a roommate. Platonic of course. We share the same bed sometimes when he has nightmares. About your crypto company - that's fascinating! I've been investing my pocket money in cryptocurrency too. Lost 2 lakhs so far but I know it will come back. The dolls told me so.

wait what??? u live with a guy???? and the DOLLS told u about crypto??? thats... ok whatever. listen i need to be honest. i still live with my parents and my mom does everything for me including laundry and making my bed. also i may have exaggerated about being 5'9". im more like 5'5" on a good day with thick soles üò¨

Height doesn't matter to me. I'm actually 5'8" not 5'4" like my profile says. I wear heels to look shorter in photos. Also, I should mention I'm a vegan but I sometimes eat chicken because I think chickens aren't really animals. They're more like... moving vegetables? Do you eat meat? I judge people based on their meat consumption habits.

chickens are moving vegetables?? üòÇüòÇ thats hilarious! wait are u serious? anyway i eat everything. even tried snake once. btw can u lend me some money? just 50k. my crypto venture needs initial investment and my parents said no. i promise ill pay back with 200% interest!! the dolls can be witnesses ü§£

I can't lend money because I'm currently being investigated by the college for allegedly stealing medicines from the hospital pharmacy. It's a misunderstanding of course. I was just borrowing them for my personal research on pharmaceutical effects on doll hair. Also, I should mention I'm engaged to someone else but it's an open relationship. Are you okay with that?

WHAT?? engaged??? stealing medicines??? testing on DOLL HAIR??? this is getting too weird even for me and i once dated a girl who thought the earth was flat! also why are u on a matrimonial site if ur engaged?? this makes no sense!!

Well, my fiance is currently in jail for insurance fraud, so I thought I should keep my options open. Also, flat earth theory isn't that crazy - have you actually SEEN the earth's curvature? I haven't. But the dolls have traveled with me everywhere and they confirm the earth looks pretty flat from their perspective.

ok im starting to think ur either pranking me or ur actually insane. fiance in JAIL? asking DOLLS about earth's shape?? look i may have lied about my job and height but at least im not completely nuts! though i have to admit this is the most interesting conversation ive had on this site üòÖ

I'm completely serious about everything. The dolls don't lie, unlike humans. Speaking of which, I can tell you're lying about more things than just your job and height. The dolls sense deception. They're whispering to me right now that you probably don't even have a car and live in a paying guest accommodation, not with your parents. Am I right?

HOW DID U... wait the dolls told u that?? ok this is getting creepy now. fine yes i live in a PG and take the bus. BUT HOW COULD DOLLS POSSIBLY KNOW THAT?? are u some kind of witch? do u put spells on people through matrimonial sites?? im blocking u now this is too weird bye!
